episode_event_general_timeattack_ch0257_:
Hey, I heard about something called a “time trial”
while I was wandering around town. Do you
know what that’s all about?
I see. I’ve never heard of battles like that before.

While we’re on the subject, do you happen to
know who has the best time right now?

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Raihan checked
the current time trial rankings on display in the
Pokémon Center.

If he’s the one at the top of the leaderboard, I
guess I’m going to have to get involved in this
time trial thing myself.

This must be fate! Let’s see... What was your
name again?

Ah, right! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! How about
joining me for some training?

I’m pretty good at team battles, but I think I need
a little practice to get used to battles where speed
is key.

Anyway, give me a shout whenever you’re up
for it!
Leon... I won’t lose to you!

I’ll beat him! The battle format doesn’t matter!
I have to beat Leon!

You’ve got someone you absolutely don’t want to
lose to, either, right? Let’s show our rivals what
we’re made of!
